entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NullabilityInfoContext does not properly respect CodeAnalysis attribute on indexer property #63849
  • NullabilityInfoContext returns incorrect result when code analysis attributes are used in a disabled context #63848
  • NullabilityInfoContext returns incorrect result for some unannotated private members #63847
  • NullabilityInfoContext reports incorrect result when mixing AllowNull and DisallowNull #63846
  • Source generated System.Text.Json serialization uses AOT-unfriendly reflection #63843
  • Memory load calculation used by GC is not aligned with Docker and Kubernetes #63840

Closed

  • native host loading more than one .net core DLL issue #63839
  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException: 'Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions, Version=5.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=adb9793829ddae60'. #52543
    Future
  • Generic math does not work in WASM AOT #60447
    7.0.0
  • Resolve differences between string.IndexOfAny and MemoryExtensions.IndexOfAny #60864
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow SslStream in ConnectCallback #63851
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Remove usage of FEATURE_CORESYSTEM #63850
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` for "boxed statics" #63845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Treat `CLS_VAR_ADDR` as never null #63844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce number of jump-stubs on ARM64 via smaller preserved space #63842
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Convert h2inc to a cmake function #63841
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix a few IL tests using the namespace syntax without an actual namespace #63772
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable the Runtime_34587 regression test with GH issue #63818 #63819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Compress operand kinds array and optimize `OperIsLocal` #63253
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Disable partial generic sharing for gparams with non-enum cons… #63813
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Unify string.{Last}IndexOfAny and span.{Last}IndexOfAny #63817
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [WIP] Fix gc_heap::remove_ro_segment #63473
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Implement IEquatable<T> on value types overriding Equals (and enable CA1066/CA1067) #63690
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #63546
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Upload checked JITs for Release branches and introduce jitmap.txt #61597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid name collision for covariant and hidden properties (#63443) #63823
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Remove CheckForOverflowUnderflow #63825
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Prevent crash if stack trace has function pointer #63787
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix NullabilityInfoContext.Create to properly analyze types with nested generic types #63556
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fixes of invalid biginteger casting #56710
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Align rva fields in reflection emit #63430
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix profiling objectsallocatedbyclass #63814
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-16

Created

  • ```dotnet nuget push``` does not accept "*.nupkg" as argument in GH Actions #23459

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nothing is suggested after entering comparison operators in `is` pattern matching #58890
  • Unnecessary cast false positive in expression trees #58887
  • char constant in Linq Queryable expression is converted to int #58886

PullRequests

Created

  • Formatting options refactoring - step 2 #58891
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Syntax tree configuration #58889
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Revert "Update System.Text.Json to 6.0.0 (#58365)"" #58888
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to features/required-members #58883
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #58885
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #58884
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #58882
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add Stack Trace Explorer to our searchable options #58869
    Area-IDE
  • Add CompilerGeneratedAttribute to record members #58542
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Records
  • [semi-auto-props]: Refactor and rename 'AccessingAutoPropertyFromConstructor' #58832
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support multi-caret when inserting doc comments #54741
    Area-IDE
  • Set IDE0008 severity #52951
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Unskip TestSupportedDiagnosticsMessageHelpLinkUri #51882
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove unneeded IVTs in Interactive layer #51476
    Area-Interactive
  • Remove unneeded ProjectReferences in CodeStyle layer #51473
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove unneeded project references in EditorFeatures layer #51471
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Extend TypeDeclarationStructureTests with records #48161
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Filter cancellation exceptions in generator driver #58843
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.2
  • Restore feature to tell people when a lambda is unnecessary. #58875
    Area-IDE
  • Create solution on the main thread in integration tests #58873
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Add focus and blur events to handle all child elements. #39561
  • Inject a Blazor component instance into the app? #39560
  • Perf regression: json #39559
  • Perf improvement: json #39558
  • Unable to render script inside blazor component #39557
  • Investigate CA1844 warnings about performance in stream #39555
  • Blazor WASM ignores the Base Href when trying to fetch hot-reload script #39554

Closed

  • ElementReference.FocusAsync() does not focus a div with a tabindex in Blazor WASM #39448
    Backlog
  • Blazor Server Access IP Address #39517

PullRequests

Merged

  • Refactor : Remove unwanted things #39548
    community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Remove Interop build step #39553
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Quality parameter to BrowserFileExtensions.RequestImageFileAsync #32772
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Blazor Server - Auto reconnect on mobile browsers #32122
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Implement BL0007: Component parameters should be auto property #30102
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Spiked HttpResponsePipeWriter #22916
    area-mvc, api-suggestion, community-contribution
  • Added ResourcesAssembly property to LocalizationOptions to set different Assembly for localization resources. #28972
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ToolbarItem is not appearing #4157

Closed

  • (Get/To)NativeView is currently redundant and not correctly returned a replaced view for hot reload #4155
  • [Windows] Adding event handler for DeviceDisplay.MainDisplayInfoChanged Error #4125
  • [Windows] Device.Display.MainDissplayInfo throws COMException #4126
  • SwipeView isn't working #4154

PullRequests

Merged

  • Sign TTF files in template #4156
  • Remove GetNative and wrapped overload #4150

Updated

  • [Android] Fix Switch color issues #4134
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Add FormattedText property support to Label in Controls #3637
    area/controls 🎮
  • ListView Handler for WinUI #3916
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4130
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
